package:
ecl_containers 1.0.3
The containers included here are intended to extend the stl containers. In all cases, these implementations are designed to implement c++ conveniences and safety where speed is not sacrificed.
Also includes techniques for memory debugging of common problems such as buffer overruns.
Daniel Stonier BSD http://wiki.ros.org/ecl_containers https://github.com/stonier/ecl_core https://github.com/stonier/ecl_core/issues Daniel Stonier -->
